article_title: Shooting incident on Camp Street, Harrisburg
article_text:
HARRISBURG, PA (WPMT) Police surround a home on the 500 block of Camp Street. The incident began after a report of shots fired at around 4 o’clock Tuesday afternoon.

A man reportedly shot a 14 year old boy in the hand. The suspect was alleged to have run into a home on Camp Street. Heavily armed police surrounded the home and with aid of a bullhorn urged the man to come out and surrender. After a more than two hours police forced their way inside but found no one.

The investigation continues.
